description: Ceramic chocolate jug; domed cover with artichoke finial; body of jug with two small floral sprays in plum, blue, burnt orange, iron red, and yellow, single flowers on cover, scrolled decoration in plum around spout, small cracks in moulded base
markings: Shield in underglaze blue; letter \'O\' (Above the shield) and numeral \'63\' (below the shield) painted in iron red
title: Covered chocolate pot
